title: Linux install script should move to systemd
description:
Most Linux distros have moved from init.d to systemd, which means that to use install_solr_service.sh on e.g. RHEL you first need to install some packages to add back init.d support.

Propose to get rid of init.d script and replace it with a systemd script. Or alternatively keep support for the old in parallell and let installer decide which to use.
